alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 8:17PM CDT until May 29 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Logan County in west central Nebraska... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stapleton to 6 miles southwest of Wellfleet, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Platte, Stapleton, Brady, Maxwell, Wellfleet, Gandy, Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, Keith, Logan, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Hoagland, Brown Lake, Vroman and Somerset. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 219 and 246. Highway 97 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 175 and 207. Highway 83 between mile markers 52 and 129. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
